mapper.select: select * from ticket_type where id in (select ticket_type_id from carriage where carriage.TRAIN_ID=#{trainId})
select distinct * from ticket_type where id in (select ticket_type_id from carriage where carriage.TRAIN_ID=#{0}) and instr(#{1},'-'||id||'-')>0

select sum(price) from route where instr(substr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}), instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{departure}||'/'), instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{destination}||'/')- instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{departure}||'/')+length(#{destination})+2) ,'/'||departure_id||'//'||destination_id||'/')>0

select count(count(*)) from seat,carriage,ticket_type where seat.carriage_id=carriage.id and carriage.ticket_type_id=ticket_type.id and ticket_type.id=#{ticketTypeId} and carriage.train_id=#{trainId} and seat.status=1 and seat.ROUTE_ID in (select id from route where instr(substr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}), instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{departure}||'/'), instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{destination}||'/')-instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{departure}||'/')+length(#{destination})+2) ,'/'||departure_id||'//'||destination_id||'/')>0) group by carriage.id,seat.num having count(*)= (select count(*) from route where instr(substr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}), instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{departure}||'/'), instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{destination}||'/')-instr((select train.entire_route from train where train.id=#{trainId}),'/'||#{departure}||'/')+length(#{destination})+2) ,'/'||departure_id||'//'||destination_id||'/')>0)
